name: Don't Ask Don't Get
tag_list: wish-list, gift-list, registry, christmas-list, birthday-list, baby-shower-list, wedding-gift-list, wish-list-iphone-app
overview:
Don’t Ask Don’t Get is a wish list service unlike any other. Traditionally, gift lists were tied to a single store but with DADG your lists are completely universal – the only limitation is your imagination!

This entirely free to use service is perfect for any occasion - birthdays, Christmas, weddings, or baby showers. There’s now finally a way to make sure you get exactly what you wish for.

Grab those must-have gift ideas on the go or in the comfort of your front room, just beware this can be highly addictive! With Twitter and Facebook integration, be sure to tell all your family and friends what you really want
